meta.title: Image Compressor - Compress Images Online for Free
meta.description: Free online image compressor. Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP. No upload to server required.

tagline: Reduce image file size instantly without losing quality

ui.title: Image Compressor
ui.description: Reduce image file size while maintaining quality.
ui.dragDrop: or drag and drop an image here
ui.processingNote: üîí Compression happens locally in your browser. Your images are never sent to our servers.

description.title: What is Image Compressor?
description.text: Image Compressor is a free online tool designed to reduce the file size of your images without significantly affecting their visual quality. It's perfect for optimizing images for websites, emails, or saving storage space on your device.

howTo.title: How to Use Image Compressor
steps: Upload an image by dragging and dropping or clicking the upload area
Adjust the compression quality slider to your preference
Wait for the automatic compression to finish
Compare the original and compressed sizes
Click 'Download Compressed Image' to save the optimized file

questions.q: Is my image uploaded to a server?
questions.a: No, all compression is done entirely within your browser using JavaScript. Your photos never leave your device.
Our tool uses smart compression algorithms to reduce file size while maintaining the best possible visual quality. You can adjust the quality setting to find the perfect balance.
We support common web image formats including JPEG, PNG, and WebP.
